name: littleye
overview:
littleye is a virtual fence around “safe websites” for kids that is easy to install, easy to use and easy to maintain. Kids can search the Internet, but only within that virtual fence of a pre-approved safe list of websites.

Other solutions make promises of keeping your kids safe online by filtering keywords or asking you to build a list of sites for kids for either PC or Apple. littleye does all the work for you and puts you in control how you want your kids to spend time online, and littleye works on both PC and Apple.

Our safe list of good websites for kids is built and maintained by a community of teachers and parents. You can use our baseline safe list of websites and add sites to the list. It’s your family and your decision where your kids go online.

littleye is easy to install and easy to use. After installation, your browser is always locked to keep your kids safe online. When you want to surf the web, simply click the littleye lock icon on your browser, enter your parental ID and password, and you can go anywhere on Internet. It’s that simple!
